name: Hi Catcat :D
greetingText: Do you know what day is this?
wishText: Maybe you're now bored to heard my wish haha! but my only wish is that for you to be what you want to be, to live your life, hope to God for make everything easier and fullfilling for you and your loved ones, for you to know that you are amazing, you are loved, you are special, and you will always be
